summary: The diff implements a new /solutions landing page with per-category anchored sections sourced from navigation + solutionServices, and adds scroll-sync state via context so the SiteHeader “Our Solutions” dropdown reflects the active category while scrolling on /solutions and resets when navigating away.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a dedicated hero/banner section to the /solutions landing page (background image via resolvePageBanner, gradient hero styling) beyond the stated scroll-sync and section/list requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for a hero/banner redesign; only required 6 scrollable sections and header scroll-sync behavior.
